data.title: Prop Money Measurements & Dimensions
data.meta_description: Photos and measurements to help you determine how many prop money stacks are needed to fill a specific space.
data.text:
Prop Money Store .com

HOME

STORE

Circulated

Pallets

Bags

Credits

Prop Money Dimension Examples

Here, you will find many photos and measurements to help determine how many money stacks are required to fill a specific space.

Our prop bills are the same size as real currency.

Prop money stacks measure 6 1/8" x 2 5/8", and are about 1/2" thick.

Contact us if you need help filling a measured area, need quotes or have any questions.

ecomm59@comcast.net

423-987-7332

We have filled bags, armored cars, bank vaults, count rooms,

swimming pools, warehouses, arenas, and covered whole city blocks.

Prop Money Measurements

$2 Million Cube

200 x $10,000, or 8 x 25 stacks measures 12" across x 11" front to back x 12" tall.

One Million Dollars Size Examples

$1 Million Dollar Stack

100 x $10,000, or 10 x 10 stacks measures 12" across x 13" front to back x approx. 5" tall. Scroll down for many photos and examples and contact us for quantity prices.

$1,000,000 Tall Stacks

$1 Million Dollar Tall Stacks

4 x 25 stacks

12" tall, 12" across, and 5-1/2" front to back.

Set Decorators and Prop Masters

We're Always Available for Quotes, and Questions.

Make It Rain

Now You See Me

Fill the air with bills or an create an epic cash drop.

Cover Large Areas

Logan Lucky

What space do you ned to fill?

One Cubic Foot of Money

This is a one foot cube, 12" x 12" x 12" filled with 200 crumpled bills, or two full print stacks.

Contact us about our specifically designed money rain bills.

Custom Money Builds

Contact us with your needs and we will put together quotes and options.

Money Cube

Our Prop Money Photo Cube measures 12" tall, 18 1/2" across, 18 1/2" front to back, and represents 525 x $10k stacks, or $5,250,000.00.

We can create photo cubes and background props in most any configuration.

$50 Million Prop Money Pallet

$50,000,000 pallet.

Prop Money Pallets are created by stacking shrink wrapped bricks of prop money stacks, in columns, around an inner box. This standard size pallet measures 3' 6" wide by 2' 8" front to back, and 2' 6" tall.

Check out Movie Money Pallet photos and examples.

Smaller pallet examples are built around an inner box, like the larger pallets.

Prop Money Pallet Sizes

Our small 4 column x 4 column pallet, measures 30" wide, by 24 1/2" deep, and is 10" tall. This is 4 columns of 20 stacks on all 4 walls, 16 columns x 20, or 320 stacks. The top is covered with 28 single stacks, for a total of 348 stacks.

Small Money Pallet

4 column x 4 column pallet.

Money Vault Pallet

Our 4 column x 3 column money vault shelf pallet measures 30" x 18 1/2" x 10", 280 stacks, with 20 on top, total 300 stacks.

Bag of Money

20" Expandable Duffel Bag with a false bottom to raise the inner floor by 5", will hold about 50 money stacks.

See our most popular Money Bags with photos and details.

Brief Case Full of Money

A Standard Size Brief Case

is 18" x 13" x 3" deep, and will hold 40 money stacks. We have a variety of money cases available, or can help find what you need.

One Million Dollars Aged

$1,000,000 Aged, Circulated, Used, and Worn Money. 100 x $10,000 aged Full Print prop stacks. This example measures 12" across x 13" front to back x 7" tall.

Check out our store for the most realistic prop money in the business.

Wall of Money

"OZARK" Money Wall

Contact us for production rental prices.

Money Shelf Sizes

Shelf Shots, 4 stacks, side view, Approx. 24 1/2" across. 25 stacks is approx 12" tall.

Money Bricks

Money Brick sizes.

5 stack bricks of money are 2 1/2" tall, 10 stack bricks measure 5", and the 25 stack bricks are 12".

These are used to build money pallets.

Storage Unit Full of Money

Fill a storage unit or a whole warehouse.

Storage Box Full of Money

Fill a storage box, 55 gallon drum, etc.

The Original Circulated/Aged Prop Money

We have filled Bags, SUVs, Armored Cars, Count Rooms, Bank Vaults, Casinos, Warehouses, Large Arenas, Covered Whole City Blocks, and Created Epic Money Drops.

Visit photos and measurements of piles of money stacks.

Contact Us for large quantity Prop Money prices.

Check out Our SITEMAP for even more photos and examples.
